title: Data Preparation
selectProject: Select a project to manage data

import.title: Import Files
import.hint: Import .txt, .jsonl, or .json files as training data source.

files.emptyHint: Import text files to get started

clean.title: One-Click Clean
clean.hint: Remove noise, fix encoding, deduplicate, and normalize your text files.

generate.title: Generate Dataset
generate.hint: Generate training dataset from cleaned text automatically.
generate.mode_qa_desc: Extract knowledge from text to generate Q&A pairs. Ideal for building knowledge bases and FAQ training data.
generate.mode_style_desc: Analyze the writing style and generate new content imitating it. Ideal for training models to learn a specific author's style.
generate.mode_chat_desc: Generate multi-turn conversations based on text content. Ideal for training dialogue and context understanding.
generate.mode_instruct_desc: Convert text into instruction-output pairs covering summarization, analysis, reasoning, etc. Ideal for general instruction fine-tuning.
generate.modeCheckTitle: Mode Compatibility Check (Based on Current File Types)
generate.modeCheckGeneralHint: Text-based content detected. All four modes are usable; style imitation works best on coherent prose.
generate.modeCheckProseHint: Narrative prose detected. Style Imitation and Knowledge Q&A are recommended.
generate.modeCheckDialogueHint: Dialogue content detected. Multi-turn Chat and Knowledge Q&A are recommended.
generate.modeCheckNoFiles: Import files first to get mode recommendations.
generate.modeCheckStructuredHint: Structured data detected (e.g. JSON/CSV). Knowledge Q&A or Instruction mode recommended.
generate.installOllamaHint: Install Ollama to use AI for higher quality dataset generation
generate.builtinHint: Uses rule-based extraction to generate training data. No AI model needed, fast but limited quality.
generate.ollamaHint: Uses local Ollama LLM for high-quality training data generation. 7B+ models recommended.
generate.noModeSelected: Please select a generation mode first

preview.title: Preview
preview.noContent: Select a file to preview its content

dataset.noVersions: No datasets yet, generate one first

validation.needMethod: Please select a generation method first
validation.needModel: Please select an AI model first
validation.needMode: Please select a generation type first

segment.title: Smart Segmentation Preview (Auto)
segment.hint: The system auto-matches a segmentation strategy by file type and refreshes this preview after cleaning.
segment.empty: No segments yet. Run cleaning or start generation first.
